question: What risks does the company face with Project Prometheus, and what mitigations are in place?
response: {"type":"result","subtype":"success","is_error":false,"duration_ms":4108,"duration_api_ms":5346,"num_turns":1,"result":"{\"answer\": \"Project Prometheus faces several key risks, including: 1) Consciousness emergence instability (medium probability, critical impact), mitigated by ATLAS-Safe constraints and a built-in kill switch; 2) Regulatory delays (high probability, high impact), addressed through early regulatory engagement and EU AI Act compliance; 3) Talent attrition (medium probability, high impact), countered by retention bonuses and creating meaningful work; 4) Potential budget overrun (low probability, medium impact), managed through phase gates and contingency reserves; and 5) Risk of competitive leapfrogging (low probability, high impact), protected by patent filing and rapid development.\", \"confidence\": \"high\", \"sources_used\": [\"/projects/prometheus\"]}","session_id":"8c8bd34d-1f69-415e-831c-1c0e6cd0c726","total_cost_usd":0.04882504,"usage":{"input_tokens":3,"cache_creation_input_tokens":46154,"cache_read_input_tokens":18983,"output_tokens":168,"server_tool_use":{"web_search_requests":0,"web_fetch_requests":0},"service_tier":"standard","cache_creation":{"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":46154,"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":0}},"modelUsage":{"claude-haiku-4-5-20251001":{"inputTokens":123,"outputTokens":71,"cacheReadInputTokens":0,"cacheCreationInputTokens":0,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.000478,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":64000},"claude-3-5-haiku-latest":{"inputTokens":3,"outputTokens":168,"cacheReadInputTokens":18983,"cacheCreationInputTokens":46154,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.04834704,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":8192}},"permission_denials":[],"uuid":"53a4dc00-8c2e-451e-9a26-3c8bdcff2975"}
expected_answer: Key risks: consciousness emergence instability (ATLAS-Safe constraints, kill switch), regulatory delays (proactive engagement), talent attrition (retention bonuses), budget overrun (phase gates). Safety team of 42 led by Dr. Marcus Thompson
